sentences.sContent: University reform had long been his bugbear, and now was his bane.
sentences.sContent_eng: University reform had long been his bugbear, and now was his bane.
sentences.sCn: 大学改革早就是使他头痛的事情， 如今更成为他的祸害了。

remMethod.val: “背” → 背运不断， 令人苦恼 → 使人苦恼的

words.tran: 有害的；有毒的；使人苦恼的

trans.tranCn: 有害的； 使人苦恼的
